text: Krzysztof Skorupski (born 25 April 1989) is a professional rallycross driver from Warsaw in Poland. He raced in the opening four rounds of the World Rallycross championship with Monster Energy World RX following victory in the Polish Super1600 category. ==Results== ===Complete FIA World Rallycross Championship results=== Skorupski at the 2014 World RX of Great Britain ====Supercar==== {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- valign="top" !
